attributes.action: Grant Bill Shankly a posthumous knighthood for his achievements in the world of Football.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bill Shankly achieved a remarkable amount in his time within football and as well as winning numerous trophies with Liverpool, he created the foundations for the most successful team in English sporting history. There are many people who have been rewarded more, for much less.
